content: Has anyone here used exchange as an inbound email server? By default (if at all) it does not seem to allow the plus addressing model.

@Tim April I'm not sure there's a good solution to that problem unless Exchange offers another way to have multiple email addresses go to the same inbox (which is how we encode which stream one is replying to). I'd consider just running the Zulip-configured postfix on your Zulip server's domain that just feeds received emails to Zulip..
If you can configure a routing rule of another form using another delimiter, that would work just as well; Zulip supports a broader range of patterns I'm pretty sure.
